english_translation: Obstacles will not trouble for a hundred ages

kannada_original: ಇಂದು ಅದು ಬಲು ಕಠಿಣ; ನಾಳೆ ಅದೆ ಸುಲಭ.
english_transliteration: Indu adu balu kaṭhiṇa; nāḷe ade sulabha.
english_translation: Today it is very difficult; tomorrow it is easy.
Do not hesitate, do not fear; proceed as it comes;

kannada_original: ಆಗ ಈ ಬಾಳ್ ಹಗುರ – ಮುದ್ದು ರಾಮ.
english_transliteration: Āga ī bāḷ hagura – Muddu Rāma.
english_translation: Then this life will be light – Muddu Rama.
